title: 1958 St. Louis Cardinals season
text:
The 1958 <a href="St.%20Louis%20Cardinals">St. Louis Cardinals</a> season was the team's 77th season in <a href="St.%20Louis%2C%20Missouri">St. Louis, Missouri</a> and its 67th season in the <a href="National%20League">National League</a>. The Cardinals went 72–82 during the season and finished 5th in the National League.
Regular season.
Third baseman <a href="Ken%20Boyer">Ken Boyer</a> won a <a href="Gold%20Glove%20Award">Gold Glove</a> this year.
